resources.string: Complete the device setup process to get the most out of your device
Your phone is set up and ready to use.
Remember, you can change your selections at any time in Settings.
And you can manage your Verizon account and connect to your Verizon Cloud right from your phone.

"Your phone needs a ^1 to work. You may not have inserted your SIM card yet or it may be inserted incorrectly. \n\n Please turn off your phone and make sure your SIM card is inserted as shown below. Then turn your phone back on."
Sorry, this SIM card is not readable. Please contact your wireless service provider.
This SIM card is from an unknown source.
This SIM card is not from Verizon Wireless.
Sorry, this SIM card is not supported. Please contact your wireless service provider.
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Please call %1$s from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again by restarting your phone."
Please note, the activation will take a few minutes.

"Before you activate this phone: \u00091.\u0009Back up your contacts from your old phone. \u00092.\u0009Turn off your old phone.
When you tap Activate Now, we will: \u00091.\u0009Deactivate your old phone. \u00092.\u0009Transfer your old phone number to this phone. \u00093.\u0009Activate this phone."
Your activation has begun. Please wait while we get your phone ready to set up.
"We need to deactivate your old phone before we can activate your new phone. Remember to turn off your old phone."
"Once your phone is activated, we'll walk you through setting up your email and Verizon Cloud."
"We're working on transferring your existing phone number to your new phone."
"To get started, enter the last 4 digits of the Account Owner's Social Security Number:"
"To get started, enter your account's Billing Password"
"Want to verify another way? ""Use your account's Billing Password instead."
"Its a password created by the Account Owner to use for account access instead of the last 4 digits of the Social Security Number. Note: It is not the same as your My Verizon password."

"This entry does not match our records.
Please try again."
"Sorry, we're having trouble verifying your account. Please contact Verizon Wireless at (800) 922-0204."

"To activate your phone, follow the instructions included with your new phone.
Or contact your organization's Verizon Wireless administrator and provide the following information:
Device ID: %1$s
SIM ID: %2$s"
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Please call (877) 807-4646 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again."

"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone.
Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside.
Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again.
If this problem persists, please contact Customer Service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance."
To activate your phone, call (800) 922-0204 from any phone other than your new phone.

"Please wait while we activate your new phone. This may take up to %1$d minutes. If you are moving your number from your old phone to this one, remember to keep your old phone turned off until activation is complete."
This SIM card is not recognized or registered. Please contact your wireless service provider.

"A Verizon Wireless SIM card has activated your service and updated your phone's roaming capabilities.
Your phone number is %1$s."

"Your phone can share its approximate location with apps and services like maps, shopping and weather. Read the privacy policy of any app or service provider you're considering to understand how they collect, use and share your location information before you use them."

"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone.
If you're moving your phone number from your old phone to this one, make sure your old phone is turned off.
Also, make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside.
Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again."
Please wait, this may take a few minutes.
Please wait while we skip setup.
It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.
Data usage for downloading, using and updating apps will be billed according to your plan.
Are you sure you want to leave the Setup Wizard? If you leave now, you will skip important steps in setting up your phone.
You cannot get the sim status while the device is in airplane mode. Would you like to turn airplane mode off?
Sorry, this SIM card is not registered. Please call (877) 807-4646 from another phone.
You can always finish the wizard later by going to Apps > Setup Wizard.
The SIM card has already been activated. Your phone number is:
A network connection is required to continue with setup. Please connect to a Wi-Fi network.
Note: You can set up your phone using Wi-Fi, but you won’t be able to make or receive calls until your phone has been activated on the Verizon network.
Also, you won’t be able to make emergency calls, after this screen until you finish the Setup Wizard.
Tap an email to set it up
You will be able to setup your Gmail account in a later step.
You cannot setup Gmail here. Use the Gmail app to add your account.
Gmail setup is in a later step.
Use the Gmail app to add your account.
"The network you're connecting to requires you to sign in first."

"You haven't activated your phone yet.
You will not be able to make phone calls, send text messages or use the Internet on the Verizon network.
To activate your phone later, go to Settings -> View Verizon Account."
Note: You will not be able to make or receive phone calls, including emergency calls, after this screen until you finish the Setup Wizard.
"Email setup is not available because you don't have a data connection. Connect to a Wi-Fi network to set up email now, or set it up later in the Email app."
Sorry, that Wi-Fi network is not connected to the Internet right now. Please try a different network or leave setup.
When using mobile data for downloading, using and updating apps, you will be billed according to your plan.

"FOR USE BY VERIZON STORE EMPLOYEES ONLY
Enter the password to enable Verizon store demo mode on this device"
, however your data usage is currently limited due to time of day or a data limit.

"Please note, the activation will take a few minutes.
To set up your phone using Wi-Fi only, tap Doni't Activate."
Please contact Customer Service at (800) 922- 0204 for assistance.
"Activating your phone... Don't turn it off"
Do you want to activate your phone so you can use the Verizon network to access the Internet?
"Call (877) 807-4646 from another phone. You'll need your account information."
"Call (877) 807-4646 from another phone. You'll need your account information."
Sorry, the screen has expired. It will update when you tap OK.
Do you want to purchase data so you can use the Verizon network to access the Internet?

Verizon Cloud is subject to the terms of your Customer Agreement and Plan. If you want to stop using Verizon Cloud at anytime, open the app and select "Turn Off". 

After that, you will no longer have access to the contacts stored in your Cloud. You will also lose access to your Cloud if you end your Verizon Wireless service. 

In addition,we may immediately end the Verizon Cloud service without liability, but we'll send you a notice first.

"Connecting to a Wi‑Fi or mobile network helps you quickly set up your phone. 

Without a connection, you can’t:
 · Sign in to your Google Account
 · Restore apps & data
 · Get software updates
 · Automatically set up time and date
"\n\n\t\tYour phone will use your mobile network to complete setup, which may include updates and app downloads. Data usage may apply."
Activating now. This may take up to 5 min..
Your phone is set up and ready to use. Remember, you can change your selections at any time in Settings.
you skip the activation ui,so you can see this.if you want to continue active you phone,press back to retry! or press \'Next\' to continue!
sim is not ready,if you want to continue active you phone,press back to retry!
Failed to activate your phone,if you want to continue activate you phone,press back to retry! or press \'Next\' to continue!
To activate your phone, call (800) 922-0204 from another phone.

Sorry, were having trouble activating your phone. Please call (800) 922-0204 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again by restarting your phone. You’ll need your account information.
"Now , you need to restart your phone to complete activation. please press "Reboot" key!
Note : you will not be able to make or receive phone calls, including emergency calls, after this screen until you finish the Setup Wizard.\n

string.name: ssn_another_way
string.u: Or tap here to use the last 4 digits of the Account Owner\'s SSN instead.

resources.string: What is an account PIN?\nit\'s a password created by the Account Owner for account access.NOTE: it\'s different from your My Verizon password

Keep your contacts safely backed up with Verizon Cloud. 

Contacts previously saved in Verizon Cloud or Backup Assistant will be synced to this phone. 

By selecting Next, you agree to the Terms & Conditions.
Please note the activation will take a few minutes.
Your activation has begun. Please wait while we get your phone ready to set up
We need to deactivate your old phone before we can activate your new phone. \n\nRemember to turn off your old phone and leave it off until activation is complete
Sorry, we\'re having trouble activating your phone. Please call (877) 807-4646 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again. You\'ll need your account information.
This entry does not match our records. Please try again.
Sorry, Can\'t Activate. To activate your phone, call (800) 922-0204 from any phone other than your new phone.
Once your phone is activated, we\'ll walk you through setting up your email and Verizon Cloud Buttons

To activate your phone, follow the instructions included with your new phone. Or contact the Verizon Wireless administrator at your organization and provide the following information:

Device ID: 
\t%1$s

SIM ID: 
\t%2$s

Sorry, we\'re having trouble activating your phone. Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside. Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again. If this problem persists, please contact Customer Service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.

Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. 

Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside. 

Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again. 

If this problem persists, please contact Customer Service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.

Sorry, we\'re having trouble activating your phone. Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside. Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again. If this problem persists, please contact Customer Service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.
Sorry, we\'re having trouble activating your phone. Please call (877) 807-4646 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again.

Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. 

If you're moving your phone number from your old phone to this one, make sure your old phone is turned off. 

Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars). If you are indoors, try moving closer to a window or going outside. 

Once your signal is good, you can try activating again by turning this phone off, then on again. If the problem persists, please contact Customer Service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.

Your new Verizon Wireless phone is now active. Your phone number is %1$s. 

You will not be able to make or receive phone calls, including emergency calls, while setting up your phone. 

Your phone can share its approximate location with apps and services like maps, shopping and weather. Read the privacy policy of any app or service provider youre considering to understand how they collect, use and share your location information before you use them.
We\'re working on transferring your existing phone number to your new phone.

Before you activate this phone:
 1. Back up your contacts from your old phone. 
 2. Turn off your old phone. 

When you tap Activate Now, we will: 
 1. Deactivate your old phone.
 2. Transfer your old phone number to this phone.
 3. Activate this phone.
